verses.verse: (The Majesty of Godâ€™s Rule) (Ps 65.6; 96.10; 97.1; 99.1; 104.1) The LORD is king; he is robed in majesty; the LORD is robed; he is girded with strength. He has established the world; it shall never be moved;
(Ps 45.6; 90.2) your throne is established from of old; you are from everlasting.
The floods have lifted up, O LORD, the floods have lifted up their voice; the floods lift up their roaring.
(Ps 65.7; 89.9) More majestic than the thunders of mighty waters, more majestic than the waves (Cn: Heb majestic are the waves) of the sea, majestic on high is the LORD!
(Ps 19.7; 1 Cor 3.17) Your decrees are very sure; holiness befits your house, O LORD, forevermore.
